text: Vazhkai / Jeevitham may refer to: * Vazhkai, 1949 Tamil film produced and directed by A. V. Meiyappan and starred by Vyjayanthimala in her screen debut * Jeevitham (1950 film), 1950 Telugu film produced and directed by A. V. Meiyappan and starred by Vyjayanthimala in her Telugu cinema debut * Bahar (film), 1951 Hindi film produced by A. V. Meiyappan and directed by M. V. Raman while starred by Vyjayanthimala in her Hindi cinema debut
title: Vazhkai / Jeevitham
